description: Lawson Kane is enjoying his decompression. Having just got off work, he's ready for a relaxing shower and a night at home. Spreading his legs wide, he jacks his dick into a full salute. And as the bathroom begins to steam up, one might mistake it for the humidity of the water, or it might just be the heat that Lawson is emitting, before he goes at it with determination and works up a load that explodes all over his chest in messy sticky relief.
title: Lawson Kane, Scene #01
